Package info.monitorenter.gui.chart.views

GUI views for charts and traces.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ChartCoordinateView A view that displays the data value of the point the mouse pointer currently is over the Chart2D component within two JTextField instances.
ChartPanel A decoration for Chart2D that adds various controls for a Chart2D and it's ITrace2D instances in form of popup menues.
 

Package info.monitorenter.gui.chart.views Description

GUI views for charts and traces.

This package offers widgets that allow to react (show a view) on charts and traces.

The implementations are kept minimal but some controls consist of several visible components. Therefore fixed layouting has to be done. In that case the widgets are intended for demonstration of chart / trace interaction only.

Since:
1.1.0
Version:
